name: 1000 Stages: The King Of Platforms
description:
Now, A stupid man will step front 1000 stages.Famous
Dr.Hu



Who you are controling; A doctor graduated from a famous university.

Has a yellow hat and sword for decoration.

Miss.Cos



A pedestrians seemly unmarried, just appears only once on scene 6.

There are no story about Miss.Cos and Dr.Hu.Guides of The Journey
  • Cross 9 difference Scenes so to win
  • You can take off the sword
  • There are 6 just Achievement
  • Selected Background music
  • NO maximum heart limits, NO time counts down, NO a mass of enemies, NO scores
  • No dangerous on falling in love

Important: Please use a joystick!
